mapper.insert: insert into tbl_class (class_nickname, class_title, class_category, class_place, class_price, class_start, class_end, class_approve, class_img, class_one, class_status, user_num, class_introduce) values (#{classNickname}, #{classTitle}, #{classCategory}, #{classPlace}, #{classPrice}, #{classStart}, #{classEnd}, #{classApprove}, #{classImg}, #{classOne}, #{classStatus}, #{userNum}, #{classIntroduce})
mapper.select: select class_num, class_nickname, class_title, class_category, class_place, class_place_detail, class_start, class_end, class_price, class_approve, class_img, class_one, class_status, class_introduce from tbl_class where class_num = #{classNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_class set class_title = #{classTitle}, class_category = #{classCategory}, class_price = #{classPrice}, class_place = #{classPlace}, class_place_detail = #{classPlaceDetail}, class_start = #{classStart}, class_end = #{classEnd}, class_introduce = #{classIntroduce}, class_nickname = #{classNickname} where class_num = #{classNum}
update tbl_class set class_status = '1' where class_num = #{classNum}
mapper.select: select count(class_num) from tbl_class where user_num = ${userNum}

select class_num, class_nickname, class_title, class_category, class_place, class_start, class_end, class_img, class_one, class_status, class_introduce, user_num from tbl_class where class_approve = '0'
mapper.update: update tbl_class set class_approve = '1' where class_num = '#{classNum}'
